name: sscce-firebase
description: Short, Self Contained, Correct Example for Firebase bugs

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r assets/* dist
scripts.start: npm run dist && ln src/index.html dist && firebase emulators:exec 'npm run esbuild -- --sourcemap --watch'
scripts.build: npm run dist && cp src/index.html dist && npm run esbuild -- --minify

author: Laurent Payot
